snippet: Former Gov. Jeb Bush of Florida is getting closer to making a decision about running for president, but he wonders whether he can secure the Republican nomination without pandering to the party’s conservative base.
abstract: Former Gov. Jeb Bush of Florida is getting closer to making a decision about running for president, but he wonders whether he can secure the Republican nomination without pandering to the party’s conservative base.
lead_paragraph: Former Gov. Jeb Bush of Florida is getting closer to making a decision about running for president, but he wonders whether he can secure the Republican nomination without pandering to the party’s conservative base.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Weighs Whether a Centrist Can Win
